fields.doc: Timestamp when the Kafka message was created.
fields.name: kafka_timestamp

fields.doc: Which target: is being defined (current or next)
fields.name: targetInstance

fields.doc: Target epoch in years e.g. 2000.0. Julian (J) epoch is assumed.
fields.name: epoch

fields.doc:
RA of target as a string, in the form HH:MM:SS.

RA Minutes and RA Seconds are optional. An optional fractional part can be provided with any of the Hours, Minutes or Seconds fields.
fields.name: ra

fields.doc:
Declination of target as a string, in the form DD:MM:SS.

Declination Minutes (decMins) and Declination Seconds (decSecs) are optional. An optional fractional part can be provided with any of the Degrees, Minutes or Seconds fields.
fields.name: declination

fields.doc: Desired instrument position angle, Eastwards from North
fields.name: rotPA

fields.doc:
Rotator co-ordinate frame.
target = same frame as target. 
fixed   = maintain sky orientation ( = AZEL)
fields.name: rotFrame

fields.doc: Rotator position mode (Field or Slit optimized)
fields.name: rotMode
